price: Dize: "Allah vos salva destas e de todas as angústias; todavia, vós idolatrais!"
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنۡهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرۡبٖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahu yunajjīkum min'hā wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikūna
